TopicTitle: Voyager Labs Aeronautics and Space Administration (ORDERS ON HOLD ATM)

Articles.Content: can you please post the craft files for the stailites.
Well I gatta make out a Mod list and I have almost all our sattelites in my craft files, And MANY MORE, 3 duna probes, 1 eve probe and a few Mun and Minmus.
yes i can't wait till the craft files are out

Most use KW Payload and Probodyne ffrom Silisko but I will make a Full Mod List, The Craft will go with the Mission stats in the Spoiler of Say Voyager I or Voyager II The Duna Lander, Let me make a full mod list and I will update the Mission thread soon with the Craft Files, Give meh about an hour.
All of them use KW PLF and Probodyne, if you want to see what the missions looked like I updated the mission board.
I would like a rocket/spaceplane that can get to Jool's moon Laythe (and back) capable of being outfitted for docking mods. (so stock parts)
Give ma about two hours I promise the craft files will be up, Posting from school and I will post them in the Missions Tab.

As I promised I uploaded the .craft files for our probes, Voyager I is special so i'm keeping it out and im having problems uploading Minmus Link ATM. The Craft files are in the Mission page in the spoiler at the bottom of the description.
I would like a craft able to get the DEMV rover to Duna and has mechjeb. The usable mods are as follows: DEMV and Mechjeb

I would like to have a rocket capable of getting to Eve and back, mods allowed: Mechjecb, Mechanical Mouse industries (not the kethane pack, only sattalite and payload packs)

note: I would like the payload to be built from the ion engines in MMI
I got the orders and I sent them where they need to go also here are some classified pics I dug up and decided to share,it looks like a Duna probe .
where is my hovercraft? can i get a progress report on it?
The hovercraft order is a big no go ATM because it is nearly impossible zapy, let me keep working and try to fix it.

yea i know i made a hover craft thing using a mod and still it woulnd let me get a static height above the ground it alws stayd going up or going down so i had to continuisly change the speed to stay around the same height but it has to be posseble becuas iv seen like a person that made like a hover tank using servral mods

I think I may have a working Hovercraft but it is very unstable and cant fly that far, Maybe you can work off of it.

Also No comments on Voyage our first rover in the Twin Duna Rovers? Voyage and Oddysey (dont know how to spell it GRRR) are there names.
